title: SEGFAULT on 'nightly' toolchain cross-compiling for i686-unknown-linux-gnu

labels.name: I-crash
labels.description: Issue: The compiler crashes (SIGSEGV, SIGABRT, etc). Use I-ICE instead when the compiler panics.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
### Code ```toml # cargo.toml [package] name = "kernel" version = "0.0.0" edition = "2018" # See more keys and their definitions at https://doc.rust-lang.org/cargo/reference/manifest.html [dependencies] lazy_static = { version = "*", features = ["spin_no_std"] } volatile = "0.2.6" spin = "*" [profile.dev] panic = "abort" [profile.release] panic = "abort" [lib] path = "src/kernel.rs" crate-type = ["staticlib"] ``` ```toml # config.toml [unstable] build-std = ["core", "compiler_builtins"] build-std-features = ["compiler-builtins-mem"] [build] target = "i686-unknown-linux-gnu" rustflags = [ "-C", "relocation-model=static", "-C", "link-args=-m32" ] ``` ```json (this is the build target, i.e. "x86-unknown-none.json") { "llvm-target": "i686-unknown-linux-gnu", "data-layout": "e-m:e-n8:16:32-p:32:32", "arch": "x86", "target-endian": "little", "target-pointer-width": "32", "target-c-int-width": "32", "os": "none", "executables": true, "linker": "ld.lld", "linker-flavor": "rust-lld", "panic-strategy": "abort", "disable-redzone": true, "features": "-mmx,-sse,+soft-float" } ``` ***remark:** anything else project-wise you might think relevant can be found [in the project repo](https://github.com/avirule/gsai_os) (prefer browsing the repo at the initial commit for the exact conditions that led to the issue)* ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.48.0 (7eac88abb 2020-11-16) binary: rustc commit-hash: 7eac88abb2e57e752f3302f02be5f3ce3d7adfb4 commit-date: 2020-11-16 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.48.0 LLVM version: 11.0 ``` ### Error output ``` error: could not compile `core` Caused by: process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name core --edition=2018 /home/whiterabbit/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/lib.rs --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi,artifacts --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,metadata,link -C opt-level=3 -C panic=abort -C embed-bitcode=no -C metadata=6fd114a6ec2d4f77 -C extra-filename=-6fd114a6ec2d4f77 --out-dir /home/whiterabbit/git/gsai_os/target/i686-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps --target i686-unknown-linux-gnu -Z force-unstable-if-unmarked -L dependency=/home/whiterabbit/git/gsai_os/target/i686-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps -L dependency=/home/whiterabbit/git/gsai_os/target/release/deps --cap-lints allow -C relocation-model=static -C link-args=-m32` (signal: 11, SIGSEGV: invalid memory reference) warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... ```
Backtrace

``` (gdb) bt #0 0x00007fffefd4bc5e in (anonymous namespace)::MachineCSE::runOnMachineFunction(llvm::MachineFunction&) () from /home/whiterabbit/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/../lib/libLLVM-11-rust-1.50.0-nightly.so #1 0x00007fffefd6d78e in llvm::MachineFunctionPass::runOnFunction(llvm::Function&) () from /home/whiterabbit/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/../lib/libLLVM-11-rust-1.50.0-nightly.so #2 0x00007fffefb47fd2 in llvm::FPPassManager::runOnFunction(llvm::Function&) () from /home/whiterabbit/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/../lib/libLLVM-11-rust-1.50.0-nightly.so #3 0x00007fffefb4e9e3 in llvm::FPPassManager::runOnModule(llvm::Module&) () from /home/whiterabbit/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/../lib/libLLVM-11-rust-1.50.0-nightly.so #4 0x00007fffefb48a2a in llvm::legacy::PassManagerImpl::run(llvm::Module&) () from /home/whiterabbit/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/../lib/libLLVM-11-rust-1.50.0-nightly.so #5 0x00007ffff3f08d50 in LLVMRustWriteOutputFile () from /home/whiterabbit/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-4f0cc9f50e53f0ba.so #6 0x00007ffff3e4777c in rustc_codegen_llvm::back::write::write_output_file () from /home/whiterabbit/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-4f0cc9f50e53f0ba.so #7 0x00007ffff3e4bf9e in rustc_codegen_llvm::back::write::codegen () from /home/whiterabbit/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-4f0cc9f50e53f0ba.so #8 0x00007ffff3e2de2b in rustc_codegen_ssa::back::write::finish_intra_module_work () from /home/whiterabbit/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-4f0cc9f50e53f0ba.so #9 0x00007ffff3e279d6 in rustc_codegen_ssa::back::write::execute_work_item () from /home/whiterabbit/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-4f0cc9f50e53f0ba.so #10 0x00007ffff3d0a91f in std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace () from /home/whiterabbit/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-4f0cc9f50e53f0ba.so #11 0x00007ffff3d104ad in core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once{{vtable-shim}} () from /home/whiterabbit/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/bin/../lib/librustc_driver-4f0cc9f50e53f0ba.so #12 0x00007ffff31a165a in as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once () at /rustc/1c389ffeff814726dec325f0f2b0c99107df2673/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1318 #13 as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once () at /rustc/1c389ffeff814726dec325f0f2b0c99107df2673/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1318 #14 std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start () at library/std/src/sys/unix/thread.rs:71 #15 0x00007ffff2edd6db in start_thread (arg=0x7fff9e17f700) at pthread_create.c:463 #16 0x00007ffff27fa71f in clone () at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:95 ```
